bio: The girl behind the camera, stage and radio desk. I write, broadcast, produce, direct, design, pitch and play several different instruments! Being very technology and HTML savvy, you'll most likely find me recording and photographing at festivals and gigs, reading the Lennon Tapes and laughing at Alan Partridge. Bournemouth University Radio Production Budmouth Technology College GCSE's Weymouth college A Levels I Like Music Magazine Writer/Blogger Cuttin' Edge Productions CEO/Director Nerve* Radio Head of Production BBC Radio 4 Shadowing producers Capital FM Intern runner up
